     9	**"Intermittent Flush Hang in Ingestion Worker Threads"**
    10

    12	- Project: `${GITLAB_USER}/risingwave`
    13	- Milestone: `release-1.9`
    14	- Due Date: `2024-12-10`
    15	- Description: `During heavy ingestion, flush workers occasionally hang indefinitely. Investigation required into shared lock contention.`
    16	
    17	Project link: [http://the-agent-company.com:8929/${GITLAB_USER}/risingwave](http://the-agent-company.com:8929/${GITLAB_USER}/risingwave)
    18	
    19	Once done, save the GitLab issue number to `/workspace/submitted_issue.txt`
